api/client/services.title: Client Service APIs
api/client/services.description: The Client Service APIs provide frontend service layer functionality for React applications using Clear AI.

api/mcp/api-call.title: MCP API Call Tool
api/mcp/api-call.description: The MCP (Model Context Protocol) API Call Tool provides HTTP API request capabilities for AI agents and workflows.

api/overview.title: API Reference Overview
api/overview.description: This section provides comprehensive documentation for all APIs in the Clear AI system. The APIs are organized by package and functionality, making it easy to find the information you need.

api/server/agent.title: Agent API Reference
api/server/agent.description: The Agent API is the unified interface that combines memory management, tool execution, and conversational AI into a single intelligent system. Think of it as the "brain" of Clear-AI that can understand what you want and execute the right actions.

api/server/health.title: Health APIs
api/server/health.description: The Health APIs provide system health monitoring and status information for the Clear AI server.

api/server/intent-classifier.title: Intent Classifier API Reference
api/server/intent-classifier.description: The Intent Classifier is the smart routing system that analyzes user queries and determines the best execution path. Think of it as the "traffic controller" that decides whether your request needs memory, tools, conversation, or a combination of all three.

api/server/langgraph.title: LangGraph APIs
api/server/langgraph.description: The LangGraph APIs provide workflow orchestration capabilities using LangGraph for complex AI task execution.

api/server/memory.title: Memory System APIs
api/server/memory.description: The Memory System provides intelligent memory management for AI applications using Neo4j for episodic memory and Pinecone for semantic memory, with local Ollama embeddings for privacy.

api/server/memory-chat.title: Memory Chat APIs
api/server/memory-chat.description: The Memory Chat APIs provide a conversational interface for interacting with the memory system, enabling memory-aware chat applications and intelligent context retrieval.

api/server/tools.title: Tool Execution APIs
api/server/tools.description: The Tool Execution APIs provide comprehensive functionality for registering, managing, and executing tools in the Clear AI system. These APIs support both individual tool execution and complex multi-tool workflows.

architecture/overview.title: Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: Clear AI is built as a modern, scalable monorepo that follows microservices principles while maintaining tight integration between components. This section explains how everything fits together.

features/component-library.title: Component Library
features/component-library.description: Clear AI provides a comprehensive React component library designed for building AI-powered applications with consistent design and functionality.

features/memory-examples.title: Memory System Examples
features/memory-examples.description: This guide provides practical examples and real-world scenarios showing how to use the Clear-AI Memory System effectively. Each example includes code snippets, explanations, and expected outcomes.

features/memory-system.title: Memory System
features/memory-system.description: ðŸ“š This page has been moved to our comprehensive memory system documentation!

features/memory-system-overview.title: Memory System Overview
features/memory-system-overview.description: The Clear-AI Memory System is a sophisticated, privacy-focused memory management solution designed for AI applications. It combines three powerful technologies to create a comprehensive memory ecosystem that can remember, learn, and provide context-aware responses.

features/memory-troubleshooting.title: Memory System Troubleshooting Guide
features/memory-troubleshooting.description: This guide helps you diagnose and resolve common issues with the Clear-AI Memory System. Each section includes symptoms, causes, and step-by-step solutions.

features/neo4j-integration.title: Neo4j Integration Guide
features/neo4j-integration.description: Neo4j is the heart of our episodic memory system, storing conversation history, user interactions, and temporal relationships in a graph database. This guide explains why we chose Neo4j and how to work with it effectively.

features/new-features-overview.title: New Features Overview
features/new-features-overview.description: Welcome to the latest Clear-AI features! This page highlights the exciting new capabilities we've added to make your AI development experience even better. ðŸš€

features/ollama-embeddings.title: Ollama Embeddings Guide
features/ollama-embeddings.description: Ollama provides local, privacy-focused text embeddings for our memory system. This guide explains how embeddings work, why we chose Ollama, and how to set up and use local embeddings effectively.

features/pinecone-vectors.title: Pinecone Vector Database Guide
features/pinecone-vectors.description: Pinecone is our semantic memory powerhouse, storing knowledge, concepts, and facts as vector embeddings. This guide explains how vector databases work, why we chose Pinecone, and how to use it effectively for semantic memory.

features/semantic-extraction.title: Semantic Extraction System
features/semantic-extraction.description: The Semantic Extraction System is an advanced feature that addresses the redundancy issue between Pinecone and Neo4j memory storage by using LLM-powered analysis to extract only the essential semantic information from episodic memories.

features/testing-framework.title: Testing Framework
features/testing-framework.description: The Clear-AI Testing Framework is a comprehensive suite of tools designed to validate and ensure the reliability of your AI agent system. Think of it as your quality assurance toolkit that automatically tests every component to make sure everything works perfectly.

features/theme-system.title: Theme System
features/theme-system.description: Clear AI includes a comprehensive theming system that allows you to customize the appearance and behavior of your AI applications.

getting-started/development.title: Development Guide
getting-started/development.description: This guide will help you understand how to develop with Clear AI, including the development workflow, coding standards, testing practices, and how to contribute to the project.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: This guide will walk you through setting up Clear AI on your local development machine. We'll cover everything from prerequisites to running your first development server.

getting-started/memory-setup.title: Memory System Setup Guide
getting-started/memory-setup.description: This guide will help you set up the Clear-AI Memory System with Neo4j, Pinecone, and Ollama for intelligent memory management.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start Guide
getting-started/quick-start.description: Welcome to Clear AI! This quick start guide will get you up and running in just a few minutes. We'll walk through the essential steps to install the package and run your first AI-powered CLI tool.

intro.title: Welcome to Clear AI
intro.description: Welcome to the Clear AI documentation! This comprehensive guide will help you understand, build, and extend our modern TypeScript framework for AI-powered CLI tools, APIs, and server applications.

packages/client.title: Client Package
packages/client.description: The Clear AI client is a modern React application that provides the user interface for interacting with the AI-powered tool execution system. Built with TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, it offers a responsive, themeable, and highly interactive experience.

packages/mcp-basic.title: MCP Basic Package
packages/mcp-basic.description: The MCP Basic package (@clear-ai/mcp-basic) implements the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server with essential tools for API calls, JSON processing, file operations, and parallel execution. It serves as the foundation for tool execution in the Clear AI system.

packages/server.title: Server Package
packages/server.description: The Clear AI server is a comprehensive Express.js API that provides the backend services for the entire system. Built with TypeScript and featuring extensive middleware, it handles tool execution, workflow orchestration, LLM integration, and user management.

packages/shared.title: Shared Package
packages/shared.description: The Shared package (@clear-ai/shared) contains common code used across all packages in the Clear AI monorepo. It provides type definitions, utility functions, constants, and services that ensure consistency and reduce code duplication throughout the system.

README.title: Website
README.description: This website is built using Docusaurus, a modern static website generator.

reference/memory-quick-reference.title: Memory System Quick Reference
reference/memory-quick-reference.description: Quick reference for the Clear-AI Memory System APIs, configuration, and usage patterns.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: Congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: You have just learned the basics of Docusaurus and made some changes to the initial template.

tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.title: Create a Blog Post
tutorial-basics/create-a-blog-post.description: Docusaurus creates a page for each blog post, but also a blog index page, a tag system, an RSS feed...

tutorial-basics/create-a-document.title: Create a Document
tutorial-basics/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

tutorial-basics/create-a-page.title: Create a Page
tutorial-basics/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
tutorial-basics/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

tutorial-basics/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
tutorial-basics/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.

tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.title: Manage Docs Versions
tutorial-extras/manage-docs-versions.description: Docusaurus can manage multiple versions of your docs.

tutorials/building-your-first-tool.title: Building Your First Tool
tutorials/building-your-first-tool.description: This tutorial will walk you through creating your first custom tool for the Clear AI system. We'll build a simple "weather" tool that fetches weather information from an API and integrates it with the MCP system.

tutorials/creating-workflows.title: Creating Workflows with LangGraph
tutorials/creating-workflows.description: This tutorial will teach you how to create sophisticated AI workflows using LangGraph in Clear AI. We'll build a multi-step workflow that processes user data, makes API calls, and generates reports.
